cast.original_title: The Guernsey Literary & Potato Peel Pie Society
cast.overview: Free-spirited writer Juliet Ashton forms a life-changing bond with the delightful and eccentric Guernsey Literary and Potato Peel Pie Society, when she decides to write about the book club they formed during the occupation of Guernsey in WWII.
cast.title: The Guernsey Literary & Potato Peel Pie Society

details.biography: Richard Derrington was born in 1950 in Solihull, Warwickshire, England. He is married to Louise Derrington.
details.name: Richard Derrington
